title_screen.no_ggs: The server is down right now. Check back in later.
title_screen.title: Socktile Closed Alpha 0

create_user.space_start: Usernames can't start with a space.
create_user.space_end: Usernames can't end with a space.
create_user.too_short: Usernames must be at least 3 characters long.
create_user.too_long: Usernames over 20 characters may be inconvenient.
create_user.double_space: Usernames with multiple spaces in a row may be inconvenient.
create_user.non_ascii: Usernames with emojis or other non-ascii characters may be inconvenient.
